channel.title: Lag and autosave
channel.description:
Ok, i rebuilt splidscape today, and its going really well, but i'm getting complaints that its really laggy atm, if anyone knows a solution to this please let me know.
Also, i don't think that the autosave is working, a lot of people are moaning about this. It might be because i'm rebooting a lot atm because i'm changing server a lot.

item.title: Lag and autosave
item.dc:creator: @mehaku mehaku
item.description:
@mehaku wrote:

is it totally reseting their character profiles? cuz same thing is happening to me and wolf, if you do find an answer, please relay it.

Read full topic
